description:
Marriage Hunting: While waiting for Mom to finish her document, Mr. Mizunuma was grinning. When asked, he said that he`s going to a marriage hunting party. But Fumi crushes Mr. Mizunuma`s philosophy of love one by one...; Don`t grow up: Dad`s distant relative, Tak has come after a long time. Tak had a strong image of being a boy playing in the fields but when he arrived, he really did look like an otaku...; Under the dress: Fumi forced herself to come to Mom`s friend wedding ceremony. To Fumi, a wedding ceremony is a place where there`s a lot of princess - a place where Fumi can only dream of.; Date: Everyone is supposed to eat out together but Mom and Dad are left out by their own. After being told to go on a date in a couple, they went to a fanciful Italian restaurant but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Marriage Hunting / Don`t Grow Up / What`s Under the Dress Is... / Date
コンカツ / 育つな / ドレスの下は / デート
